jump_scares.spoiler: A crow flies out from behind Corey and Jonah, startling them
Jonah jumps out from behind a desk to scare Jango and his gang
Corey turns on the lighter and there is a cut to the ghost girl standing right in front of him and screaming
Barnabas appears behind Roger as he searches for the secret room
Angelique suddenly projectile vomits towards Barnabas
The headlights of Ward’s car come on
Theresa screams “Look out!” and there is a cut to a mutilated looking G-Spot (the name of the cat) shrieking on the road
Lavinia is pulled backwards by Nathan
After calling out Lavinia’s name, there is a sudden cut to Theresa crawling towards her
As Henry turns around to look at the baby there is a cut to the baby with boils all over his face, accompanied by a loud string noise
Henry’s head falls off as a wormlike creature suddenly pierces through it
As Sloane hides in the apartment, suddenly the phone on the table rings
Sloane is pulled forward under the table
As Gwen walks through her apartment and passes the mirror again, you suddenly see the figure of a man. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Patrick is suddenly grabbed from behind
Patrick’s arguing with Sullivan. Suddenly, one of the soldiers standing around them is shot
Sloane and Melanie are talking. As Sloane turns around again, the doctor’s hand suddenly comes out of the bushes and grabs her
Patrick is looking for someone with the flashlight. When he turns around, there’s a man standing behind him. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Melanie runs with Sloane and Damon through the water in the cave. She grabs a rock and shines into a dark corner where suddenly a man is standing
After Damon says “Lets go” he is suddenly attacked by the doctor from the side
Sloane sees a double of her. After she says “I will never be you again”, the doctor attacks her
Patrick is suddenly attacked by Melanie with a knife
Sloane is attacked again by her double
Behind Melanie a man suddenly jumps out of the water and pulls her in
A hand breaks through the glass in the cell where John is staying
After waking from a dream, John looks across and sees the deformed policeman sitting beside him. [Video]
The strange cyclist appears in front of Linda while she is driving and she crashes into him
The cyclist appears behind Linda before driving off
An arm comes out from behind the door and grabs Linda on the shoulder
Linda grabs John from behind as he goes back into his room
The scene cuts to a creature making a screeching noise
Sutter Cane’s head appears beside John
The door to John’s cell starts to shake
A shadow walks past the screen, accompanied by a loud noise
The young woman suddenly growls and bites down at the samurai’s neck
Some wood falls from the ceiling
The leprechaun slams through the crate
A mouse squeaks after a tense scene
The leprechaun jumps out of the safe
Nathan falls into a bear trap
The leprechaun jumps up after they ask if he’s dead
The leprechaun appears at the car window and says “Hello, Love.
Dan O’Grady falls from the ceiling of the elevator
The leprechaun grabs Alex’s arm
A homeless man pops up against the window
Calvin suddenly attaches itself to Hugh’s hand
Calvin grips Hugh’s hand tighter
Calvin suddenly grabs the mouse
Calvin drops down onto Rory
Calvin jumps out of the coolant valve
Calvin moves past a window
David sees a dead body
Calvin lunges at David
Abby suddenly attacks the man who picked her up
The police officer attempts to break down the door, frightening Owen
Owen shouts at the police officer, causing him to turn around, Abby then jumps up and attacks the police officer from behind
A cultist grabs the woman walking down the hallway from around the corner
A man tackles D’Amour while he’s looking at the tied up man in the apartment
The presumably passed out man begins to run at D’Amour while screaming
The man in the bomber jacket smacks D’Amour with a wooden board as he about to walk around the corner
D’Amour spasms in his sleep accompanied by a loud sound
D’Amour has a flashing nightmare about Quaid screaming at him
Two hands suddenly reach out of the hole
A monster appears behind Billy after he calls out for Harry
Flames burst out behind D’Amour
D’Amour’s foot slips and he falls into the open grave
A hand grabs D’Amour from the shoulder
One of the cultists runs into frame and grabs Dorothea
Someone reaches out from under a table and grabs D’Amour by the legs
Butterfield attacks D’Amour with a knife after Dorothea says “We can’t leave him there.
The presumably dead cultist buried in the dirt grabs Dorothea’s arm
Odd turns around and a faceless man in a bowling shirt is in front of him. [Video]
A man gets hit by a truck suddenly
A cold force suddenly radiates out from the door
Odd’s hand is suddenly pulled into a hole in the door
A large number of bodachs suddenly appear in the room
Something bangs on the door that Stormy is standing behind
A bodach pops up in front of the camera
Odd closes the fridge door to reveal the ghost of Bob standing behind. [Video]
A masked man appears at a window
As Varner prepares to shoot Odd in the van, a bodach suddenly comes out of the window and screeches at Odd
As Ofelia enters the labyrinth, the fairy lands on what appears to be a rock however it moves to reveal it is actually a faun (while not strictly a jump scare this may startle some viewers)
The toad’s tongue suddenly shoots out and takes the bug crawling on Ofelia’s face
The pale man’s hand suddenly moves after Ofelia eats a grape
Vidal turns around after hearing an explosion, this is followed by a sudden scene change to a car exploding
Vidal pulls Ofelia out from underneath the bed
While attempting to escape, Mercedes moves the umbrella to reveal Vidal watching her
The man is suddenly grabbed by the Tall Man
As Mike rides his motorcycle the camera pans to the Tall Man. There follows a bang and Mike falls off the bike
Mike’s having a nightmare. His bed is suddenly in a graveyard where the Tall Man is buried. Suddenly zombies burst out of the ground and grab his arms
A door slams shut
As Mike runs towards the Tall Man something scratches across the soundtrack and the Tall Man runs towards Mike
Mike opens the box from which suddenly a creature with wings jumps and screams
Jodie is suddenly jumped from behind
As Reggie creeps through the hall his wife suddenly comes out of a dark corner and screams at him
Over Jodie suddenly hands come out of the wall
Mike opens the front door and the Tall Man suddenly appears before him
Mike pulls back the curtain and sees the Tall Man standing outside the window
Behind Mike, the door flies open and the Tall Man is in the doorway
The Tall Man suddenly storms out of the bushes
After the Tall Man says “Boy” Mike is pulled into the mirror
Ichabod reaches towards the sorceress when she suddenly leaps at him, revealing her horrific face. [Video]
After a long moment of silent tension, The Riddler lunges at the man with a roar
While Batman and Catwoman are looking into the trunk, loud gunshots suddenly hit the car
In the wide angle shot, someone suddenly appears in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
Batman is startled by a cop who is guarding the crime scene
There is a noise from behind a door in the cellar
Scotty jumps out and scares Ash
A branch falls through the window of the cabin
A loud noise startles Cheryl
Ash grabs Cheryl’s wrist as she struggles to get in the house
A branch drops down in front of Cheryl
Cheryl turns around to reveal that her face has become demonic. [Video]
Possessed Cheryl suddenly jumps up and stabs Linda with a pencil
Shelly grabs Scotty around the neck. [Video]
The dismembered hand attacks Scotty. [Video]
Linda opens her eyes and sits up in bed suddenly, revealing she has also been possessed
Scotty grabs hold of Ash, begging for help
Cheryl’s hand comes through the cellar door and grabs Ash. [Video]
Linda attacks Ash with a dagger
Cheryl grabs Ash’s ankle
Linda’s hand comes out of the ground to grab Ash
Cheryl appears at the window
Cheryl pops up again
A pipe in the cellar breaks and blood gushes out
Hands break through the door behind Ash and grab him around the neck. [Video]
Scotty sits up suddenly and grabs Ash
An arm bursts out of Cheryl’s body
Some scissors fall from a shelf while Carlos is filling his water jug
The ghost boy appears behind Carlos and touches him on the shoulder before disappearing
Carlos is surprised by his friends pulling the curtain beside his bed across while he is sleeping
Carlos looks out of a keyhole and an eye suddenly appears. [Video]

movies.title: The Last Voyage Of The Demeter

jump_scares.spoiler: The quick montage of the various shots of the ship ends with a sudden unrelated shot of Dracula lunging at the camera before the screen cuts to black
Culminating the long suspenseful scene, something suddenly moves inside the pile of dirt, startling Clemens who yelps and jumps back
Olgaren moves the spyglass and sees a closeup of Dracula’s face
Someone grabs Clemens by the shoulder from behind
Dracula moves and jumps at Petrofsky
The hatch of the cargo hold in the foreground of the shot is bumped from below
A flash of lightning reveals Dracula standing behind Larsen
Dracula jumps down at Larsen from the mast above him
A sudden cut from a quiet tense sequence to a closeup of Toby’s fingers opening the door with a loud sound
Olgaren bangs on the door after a drawn out moment of quiet tension
A sudden cut from a quiet tense sequence to a shot with loud voices and frantic movement happening in the foreground
Olgaren snarls and lunges at Clemens
Clemens, Captain Eliot and others see Dracula through the hole in the door
Dracula jumps down and grabs Toby
Abrams is hit in the head from behind
A cut to a closeup of Dracula’s snarling face
Toby’s eyes open, revealing milky white color
After several seconds of suspense, Dracula suddenly flies directly at the camera out of the mist
Captain Eliot turns around to see snarling Dracula right behind him
Someone jumps out at Sam as a joke
Sam looks around the room and runs into a woman wearing a mask
During the opening title screen, we see a quote from the Egyptian Prayer of Resurrection, this fades out and a few seconds later there is a loud noise and what appears to be sparks appear on screen
Some earth falls on Jenny, Nick, and Vail
Nick shoots Vail a third time
After the plane crash we see several plastic body bags lying in a morgue when one of them (Nick) suddenly sits up
Nick looks around while sitting on the morgue table and sees the ghost of Vail behind him
Some birds screech and fly away as a man shines a torch on the mummy sarcophagus
Ahmanet suddenly attacks the rescue worker
The second rescue worker is attacked by Ahmanet
Nick sees several rats near some rubbish and suddenly a mummified hand appears in the foreground
Ahmanet tackles a man to the ground and kisses him (turning him into a corpse)
Nick is tackled as he walks into a hallway
A mummy breaks through the ambulance window and tries to grab Nick
A mummy smashes into the windscreen
Vail appears beside Nick on the bus
A mummified hand bursts out of a tomb
One of Ahmanet’s minions attacks Nick and Jenny
Mr. Hide suddenly drops down in front of Van Helsing
One of the brides suddenly crashes out of the house as Van Helsing approaches. This is heavily telegraphed
The baby vampire’s head suddenly breaks through the cocoon
There is a sudden loud noise as Jack and Elsa “bump” into each other
Joshua comes up behind Jack and screams as he swings an axe at him
As Elsa is slowly walking towards the door, Liorn suddenly comes out and shoots an arrow at her
Jack is leaning against some bushes and a large hand grabs him
The werewolf suddenly roars and grabs Verussa
The werewolf jumps at Elsa
